org.eclipse.keyple.core.plugin.reader

Class ObservableReaderStateService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.core.plugin.reader.ObservableReaderStateService

  • public class ObservableReaderStateService
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the internal state of an AbstractObservableLocalReader Process InternalEvent against the current state

    0.9
